titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
POTTECHER 1922 A.d.L. Renewed Nov 13 Mademoiselle Pottecher Arnoudol 5, rue de la Santé Vesoul 13 rue de l'Estrapade Hte Suône Bussang Vosges
1 year 1 vol 48 (gave) 10 (oves 38 minus dep. 7 Nov 13 Jimmie Higgins Feb. 5 31 paid Nov 14 The Nation Nov 24 Feb 5 Twelve Men March 5 March 5 Conrad in quest of his youth March 27 March 27 Evelyn Innes May 11 The Jungle no extra charge The Brass Check May 11 King Cole 2 vols May 21.
